statements: DELETE FROM insurance_claims WHERE status = 'pending' AND claim_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM insurance_claims WHERE policy_id = 100 AND claim_date <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM insurance_claims_data WHERE claim_id = 1001 AND claim_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_type = 'Car' AND policy_start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Policies WHERE policy_name = 'Home Insurance';
DELETE FROM insurance_claim WHERE claimant_name = 'John Doe' AND claim_amount > 5000;
